mapper.select: select top #{page.currentNum} o.id, o.title o.attachmentImg, o.content, o.createTime, o.createUserId, o.updateTime, o.updateUserId from (select row_number() over(order by updateTime asc) as rownumber, * from (select * from tb_promotion) as oo ) as o where rownumber > #{page.rowNumber}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_promotion(id, title, attachmentImg, content, createTime, createUserId, updateTime, updateUserId) values (#{id}, #{title}, #{attachmentImg}, #{content}, #{createTime}, #{createUserId}, #{updateTime}, #{updateUserId})
mapper.update: update tb_promotion tp set tp.title=#{title}, tp.attachmentImg=#{attachmentImg}, tp.content=#{content}, tp.createTime=#{createTime}, tp.createUserId=#{createUserId}, tp.updateTime=#{updateTime}, tp.updateUserId=#{updateUserId} where tp.id=#{id}
